Articles.Content:
Hay everyone, I would like to ask about the lenovo y410p laptop. specifically the 59369921 model.

Is it good for ksp?

Is a good deal?

Is $829 a good price?

I like the specs for the price but I don't know about the actual laptop.

thanks

http://shop.lenovo.com/us/en/laptops/ideapad/y-series/y410p/index.html

if you can spring for the xtra $50 that SSD drive will help A LOT!!!
I'm not a fan of gaming laptops, but that does seem to be a good deal for the amount of power it has.

http://shop.lenovo.com/us/en/laptops/ideapad/y-series/y410p/index.html

if you can spring for the xtra $50 that SSD drive will help A LOT!!!

Ok, I probably would.
